title: Raw Vegan Chocolate Coconut Bars
directions: Pulse pecans in a food processor until crumbly, and then add dates. Pulse a few times until combined.
Add remaining ingredients and mix until well blended. Just stop here and eat this whole thing with a spoon. No? That's gross? Ok. Next step.
Press the mixture into a small wax- or parchment-lined dish or baking sheet with a lip (an 8 x 8-inch pan works well) until flat and even. Freeze for 30 minutes, and then slice.
Keep in a container in the refrigerator (or the freezer) with layers separated by wax paper.
ingredients: 1/3 cup nut butter (I used smooth almond, but sunbutter would be awesome!)
2 tablespoons -- heaping, because it's chocolate -- unsweetened cocoa powder
